definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
to melt/to thaw/to blend/to merge/to be in harmony

sentences.english: For a long time, Hong Kong has embraced the Eastern and Western cultures.
sentences.chinese: 長期以來，中西方文化在香港相互輝映，相互交融。

sentences.english: Shanghai culture is the outcome of melting the cultures of north, south, east and west.
sentences.chinese: 海派文化是南北東西文化交融的結晶。

sentences.english: National culture intrinsic content blends with modern life concept harmony.
sentences.chinese: 民族文化內蘊與現代生活觀念的和諧交融。

sentences.english: This paper discusses on Miss Lin's novel technique-----a blend of Chinese .
sentences.chinese: 文章着重就林徽因小說中西文化交融技巧作一探析。

sentences.english: Latin America meets East Asia in Los Angeles in one savory bite.
sentences.chinese: 一口美味佳淆，使拉美與東亞在洛杉磯交融。

sentences.english: Not merely housed in flesh, but brought to life.
sentences.chinese: 這不僅僅是靈肉交融，也帶來了新的生機。

sentences.english: Solo and tutti themes are subtly interwoven and the polyphonic texture is transparent.
sentences.chinese: 獨奏和樂隊部分交融在一起，復調織體卻又十分透明。

sentences.english: The integration of mood and scene is the most representative one.
sentences.chinese: “情”與“景”的交融即爲較有代表性的一種。

sentences.english: Tranströmer has said "My poems are meeting places."
sentences.chinese: 特蘭斯特羅默曾經說過，“我的詩歌是交融之所”。

sentences.english: The blending can be seen in the following three aspects.
sentences.chinese: 唐代詩畫藝術交融有以下三方面的表現。

sentences.english: Dalliance mountains in China, you can completely blend together with nature.
sentences.chinese: 在青山綠水中徜徉，你完全可與大自然交融在一起。

sentences.english: The beauty of Sanya, the beauty of the world, joined together brilliantly.
sentences.chinese: 三亞之美，世界之美，交融匯聚，閃耀啓幕。

sentences.english: The more the two civilizations intermingle, the worse the tensions will be.
sentences.chinese: 兩種文明越是交融，緊張關係就會越惡化。

sentences.english: Right click your text layer, and open blending effects.
sentences.chinese: 點擊右文貴層，並開放交融的結果。

sentences.english: Putonghua has actually resulted from the mergence of various ethnic groups and it was over a long period of time.
sentences.chinese: 普通話是在歷史長時間冶煉，多民族多方交融的結果。

sentences.english: Chapter one, the interweaving of diverse cultures.
sentences.chinese: 第一章，多元交融的文化乳汁。

definition: a mixture/an amalgam/fusion/welding together/to be in harmony with (nature)/to harmonize with/to fit in
mix together/put together (usu. things that do not blend well together)
to flow together/confluence (of rivers, airflow, roads)/(international) cooperation
to form a cohesive whole/to fuse together
to sublimate/sublimation (physics)/to raise to a higher level/to refine/promotion
to bring out the best in each other (idiom)/to complement one another well
